text: DIICOT, which stands for the Directorate for Investigating Organized Crime and Terrorism (in Romanian: Direcția de Investigare a Infracțiunilor de Criminalitate Organizată și Terorism), is a law enforcement agency in Romania. Established in 2002, DIICOT operates under the Romanian Ministry of Justice and is responsible for investigating and combating organized crime, terrorism, and other serious offenses. Category:Government of Romania Category:Law enforcement agencies
title: Directorate for Investigating Organized Crime and Terrorism
